title: Gumroad Achieves 300% Faster Feature Shipping with Claude AI | Anthropic Case Study \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Gumroad Achieves 300% Faster Feature Shipping with Claude AI | Anthropic Case Study \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how Gumroad empowered its remote team to ship features 4x faster using Claude 3.5 Sonnet. Learn how AI transformed their customer support, expedited development, and created a "just fix it" culture—enabling non-technical staff to contribute directly to product improvements.
